-- Anachronox --

Anachronox stands, and yells up to Prophetus, "I see no signs of 
activity, requesting orders for how to proceed." He had been hoping 
to engage in combat, but that could wait.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Jetstorm: Guess they don't care about us... Damn... I wanted some 
> action...
> 
> A furious grin passes on his face and he throws a tomahawk on a 
> boulder. Both explode on impact.
> 
> Jetstorm: Now, if they have something to tell us, they'll know 
we're 
> here!
> 
> -In the Hellgate-
> 
> Daemos watches his monitors, seeing no sign of activity. After a 
> minute or so, he turn to the cargo hold.
> 
> Daemos: Prophets, your drop is now.
> 
> Without a word, which was surprising considering Melchana's 
> personnality, they all move towards the door, and jump out.
> 
> They all seemed to be in some kind of trance. As they touched 
down, 
> Jetstorm couldn't help to wonder what took them or how eerie they 
> looked, until they said...
> 
> Prophets: We are... UNITED!!!
> 
> A blinding ball of light formed around them. After a moment, a 
huge 
> being stood up from it, the light moving along and fading. He 
stood 35 
> feet tall, had lion-like legs, a bladed tail, clawed hands and a 
white 
> metallic body. His face reminded of the three Prophets, yet of 
none at 
> the same time. His voice was low and loud.
> 
> Prophetus: Anachronox, give me a status report.
